CustomField.description: Fields with less than 5% population may still involve significant complexity to remove, depending on their references across the org.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( !fpro__Is_Custom_Field__c, fpro__Populate_Percentage__c*100 > 5, ISBLANK(fpro__Last_Refresh_Date_Usage__c) ), '', IF( AND(fpro__References_Total_Count_Apex__c = 0, fpro__References_Total_Count_Automations__c = 0), 'Easy', IF( AND(fpro__References_Total_Count_Apex__c = 0, fpro__References_Total_Count_Automations__c > 0), 'Medium', IF( AND(fpro__References_Total_Count_Apex__c > 0, fpro__References_Total_Count_Automations__c > 0), 'Hard', ''))) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Fields with less than 5% population may still involve significant complexity to remove, depending on their references across the org.
CustomField.label: Deletion Complexity
